explanation: [0-0] Inside a bathroom with rectangular yellow and gray floor tiles, Iron Man, Spider-Man, and Captain America are facing right, each sitting on a brown-red, red, and gray toilet respectively. Iron Man is raising both hands to the right, while Spider-Man and Captain America have their hands on their knees. On the left is a blue wall with red markings, on which hang three orange-framed picture frames.
[0-2] Then, Iron Man raises his limbs and rises upward, then sits back on the toilet and looks left.
[0-2] Then, Iron Man raises his limbs and rises upward, then sits back on the toilet and looks left.
[2-5] Subsequently, Spider-Man raises his arms, swings his body upward, then turns his back to the wall, sticks his limbs to the wall on the left, and looks to the left.
[2-5] Subsequently, Spider-Man raises his arms, swings his body upward, then turns his back to the wall, sticks his limbs to the wall on the left, and looks to the left.
[2-5] Subsequently, Spider-Man raises his arms, swings his body upward, then turns his back to the wall, sticks his limbs to the wall on the left, and looks to the left.
[5-10] Afterward, Captain America raises both his arms and swings his body upward. Immediately, he straightens up, spins, and falls into the toilet and disappears.
